markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Armor of the Holy Warrior](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1562)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 88</row>

**Price** 9,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 3
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Half Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=12)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Based on the armors used by the holy warriors who served under General Arnisant in the Shining Crusade, this well-polished _+2 [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [half plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=12)_ is decorated with religious motifs and carved with sacred scripture. While wearing _armor of the holy warrior_, your item bonus from the _greater resilient_ rune increases from +2 to +3; if you upgrade to a _major resilient_ rune, the item bonus instead increases from +3 to +4. An [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) that critically fails an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack against you while you wear this armor takes 1d6 positive damage.

 If you are evil, you're [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) while wearing the armor. If you're undead, you also take 2d6 positive damage each round that you wear the armor.

<document level="2" id="action-1176" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Armor of the Holy Warrior

While wearing armor of the holy warrior , your item bonus from the greater resilient rune increases from +2 to +3; if you upgrade to a major resilient rune, the item bonus instead increases from +3 to +4. An undead that critically fails an unarmed attack against you while you wear this armor takes 1d6 positive damage. If you are evil, you're enfeebled 2 while wearing the armor. If you're undead, you also take 2d6 positive damage each round that you wear the armor.
